biography: Joni, a celebrated name from Hill Side Golf Club, is known for his strategic brilliance on the course. While often seen as reserved, those who know him well speak of a golfer with an intense passion for the game, carefully analyzing every aspect of his play.
Joni has participated in the Hector Trophée once, securing a memorable victory. Although he did not capture the Victor Trophy, his performance was nothing short of remarkable.

Currently considered retired from Hector Trophée events, Joni will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, golf enthusiasts know that anything can happen, and a last-minute change is always a possibility.
